LOGIN.TITLE: Login
LOGIN.TITLE-TEXT: Login to your account and secure your identity.

REGISTER.TITLE: Free Sign Up
REGISTER.TITLE-TEXT: Don't have an account? Create your account, it takes less than a minute
REGISTER.VALIDATION-PASSWORD-INVALID-LEAST: Password should be at least 8 char length with at least
REGISTER.REGISTER-INFO-HEADING-DESC: Check! is an App from the Dutch Government which provides users with security, intervention & recovery functionalities against Identity Fraud. By discovering when somebody else is using your Identity, you can prevent or stop the fraud sooner.
REGISTER.REGISTER-INFO-PASSWORD-HEADING-DESC: You are encouraged to select a password that does not contain information that could be easily guessed or linked based on for example a social media account by other people. Do not use your name, date of birth or other common data on yourself or even family members. The more unique you make your password, the more difficult you will make potential access to your account by unauthorized people.
REGISTER.REGISTRATION-SUCCESS-DESC: Registration request is successful and passcode is sent to your registered email.

FORGOT-PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot password
FORGOT-PASSWORD.TITLE-TEXT-CHANGE-PASSWORD: Do you want to change your password?

RESET-PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset Password
RESET-PASSWORD.TITLE-TEXT: Do you want to reset your account? it takes less than a minute.
RESET-PASSWORD.VALIDATION-NEW-PASSWORD-INVALID-LEAST: Password should be at least 8 char length with at least
RESET-PASSWORD.RESET-INFO-HEADING-DESC: Check! is an App from the Dutch Government which provides users with security, intervention & recovery functionalities against Identity Fraud. By discovering when somebody else is using your Identity, you can prevent or stop the fraud sooner.
RESET-PASSWORD.RESET-INFO-PASSWORD-HEADING-DESC: You are encouraged to select a password that does not contain information that could be easily guessed or linked based on for example a social media account by other people. Do not use your name, date of birth or other common data on yourself or even family members. The more unique you make your password, the more difficult you will make potential access to your account by unauthorized people.

PROFILE.TITLE: Profile details
PROFILE.ZIP-CODE-EMPTY: You have to fill Zip code
PROFILE.HOUSE-NUMBER-EMPTY: You have to fill House no
PROFILE.ZIP-CODE-HOUSE-NUMBER-EMPTY: You have to fill Zip code and House no

MY-CONSENTS.TIPS-TRICKS-TITLE: When do you want Tips and Tricks to be notified
MY-CONSENTS.MY-CONSENTS-INFO: We require your consent to receive Identity Usage information from the following organizations. This is required for the effective use of the system
MY-CONSENTS.MY-CONSENTS-AUTHORIZE: I hereby Authorize Upfront Security to receive Identity Usage Alerts from the selected organizations.
MY-CONSENTS.MY-CONSENTS-FIRST-LOGIN-NOTE: NOTE: You can modify the setting any time in the user profile.

MY-NOTIFICATION-TIPS.TITLE: Notify Tips & tricks immediately
MY-NOTIFICATION-TIPS.CLEAR-ME-INFO: Delete log of all your alert data, Fraud reporting and audits stored in the system.
MY-NOTIFICATION-TIPS.DELETE-ME-INFO: Delete your user ID and all data relevant to you from the system.
MY-NOTIFICATION-TIPS.CLEAR-ME-MODAL-STR-1: By clearing your log, we will delete the log of all your alert data, Fraud reporting and audits stored in the system.
MY-NOTIFICATION-TIPS.CLEAR-ME-MODAL-STR-2: Warning: Removal of your log will be permanent and can not be recovered.
MY-NOTIFICATION-TIPS.FORGER-ME-MODAL-STR-1: By removing your account we will delete the log of all your alert data, Fraud reporting and audits stored in the system. Your user ID, consents, authentications and all data relevant to you will be removed from the system.
MY-NOTIFICATION-TIPS.FORGER-ME-MODAL-STR-2: Warning: Removal of your account will be permanent. Should you in the future again want to make use of the application, you will have to re-register.

ALERT-DETAILS.TITLE: Alert Details
ALERT-DETAILS.MODEL-FRAUD-DATA: Are you sure you want to report this alerts as fraud to the following departments?
ALERT-DETAILS.ALERT-REPORT: NOTE: This alert will be reported as fraud to following Organisation/s
ALERT-DETAILS.REPORT-SELECTION-ERROR: You have to select an option to proceed further.
ALERT-DETAILS.REPORT-FRAUD-SELECTION-ERROR: You have to select an option in report fraud to proceed further.

DASHBOARD.TIP-AND-TRICKS-INFO: By reading Tips & Tricks you will better understand how criminals work and give you advice on how to prevent Identity Fraud
DASHBOARD.OUTSTANDING-FRAUDS-INFO: Your outstanding Identity frauds are listed below.
DASHBOARD.FRAUD-MONTHLY-YEARLY-NOTE: Note: * Statistics based on all app users

USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_111: Password must include atleast one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and a special character

USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_116: Passcode must be equal to 8 digits

USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_123: Region must be less than or equal to 20 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_124: CountryCode must be equal to 2 or 3 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_128: User ID must be exactly 8 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_130: Token must be less than or equal to 200 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_131: AddressLine3 must be less than or equal to 25 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_132: Zip Code must be less than or equal to 10 characters

AUTHENTICATION.AUTHENTICATION-INFO: Authenticate your identities so that, we alert you whenever your identities have been used in our partnersystems.  You can report identity fraud in case your identity has been misused.
